statements: SELECT * FROM PestInfestationData;
SELECT pest_type, pest_count FROM PestInfestationData WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM PestInfestationData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Infestations FROM PestInfestationData WHERE environment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM PestInfestationData WHERE timestamp >= '2021-08-01' AND timestamp < '2021-09-01';
SELECT * FROM PestInfestationData WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT pest_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM PestInfestationData GROUP BY pest_type;
SELECT environment_id, MAX(pest_count) AS max_pest_count FROM PestInfestationData GROUP BY environment_id;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, pest_type FROM PestInfestationData WHERE pest_count > 10 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(pest_count) AS avg_pest_count, MIN(pest_count) AS min_pest_count, MAX(pest_count) AS max_pest_count FROM PestInfestationData;
SELECT * FROM pests_table;
SELECT pest_name, infestation_level FROM pests_table WHERE infestation_level > 5;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_conditions WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT timestamp, pressure FROM environmental_conditions WHERE humidity < 60;
SELECT * FROM environmental_conditions ORDER BY pressure DESC;
SELECT * FROM pests_table WHERE infestation_level > 5;
SELECT sensor_id, pest_name FROM pests_table ORDER BY pest_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM environmental_conditions WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id, humidity, pressure FROM environmental_conditions WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM pests_table JOIN environmental_conditions ON pests_table.sensor_id = environmental_conditions.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM PestIdentification WHERE infestation_level > 5;
SELECT id, sensor_id, pest_type FROM PestIdentification WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT sensor_id, humidity, temperature FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalConditions WHERE location = 'Garden' AND weather_condition = 'Sunny';
SELECT location, wind_speed FROM EnvironmentalConditions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY wind_speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM PestIdentification WHERE infestation_level > 5;
SELECT pest_type, infestation_level FROM PestIdentification WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY infestation_level DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature FROM SensorData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY temperature ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, weather_condition, wind_speed FROM EnvironmentalConditions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100;
SELECT * FROM pest_infestation_data;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM pest_infestation_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM environmental_conditions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_locations WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT name, description FROM pest_types WHERE id < 5;
SELECT * FROM pest_infestation_data;
SELECT id, sensor_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM pest_infestation_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY humidity DESC;
SELECT timestamp, humidity, pest_type FROM pest_infestation_data WHERE humidity < 60 AND pest_type = 'Ants' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM sensor_locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN -90 AND 90 AND longitude BETWEEN -180 AND 180;

SELECT pest_types.name, pest_types.description, COUNT(pest_infestation_data.id) AS total_infestations FROM pest_types LEFT JOIN pest_infestation_data ON pest_types.name = pest_infestation_data.pest_type GROUP BY pest_types.name, pest_types.description ORDER BY total_infestations DESC;
SELECT * FROM pests;
SELECT pest_name, infestation_level FROM pests;
SELECT pest_id, pest_name FROM pests WHERE infestation_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors WHERE installation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM pests WHERE infestation_level > 3 ORDER BY pest_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors WHERE installation_date < '2021-01-01' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT pest_name, temperature, humidity FROM pests p JOIN sensor_data sd ON p.pest_id = sd.pest_id WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50;
SELECT location, humidity, wind_speed FROM sensors s JOIN environmental_conditions ec ON s.location = ec.humidity WHERE wind_speed > 10;
SELECT pattern_id, pest_name, correlation_score FROM infestation_patterns ip JOIN pests p ON ip.pest_id = p.pest_id WHERE correlation_score > 0.7 ORDER BY correlation_score DESC;
